attributes.action: Balanced migration - limit migration into the country equal to migration out
attributes.additional_details:
Migration into and out of the country should be equalised - when a person leaves, then a person is allowed in.

The United Kingdom is one of the most densely populated countries in the world.  We rely on imports for food and fuel, we cannot sustain the (growing) population that we have in a decent manner.  Social resources such as the NHS and education are over-subscribed, we have high unemployment and soaring rents for inadequate accommodation.

Until the government get a grip on these problems the problems can be helped from getting worse, by holding the population at its present level.
